an10.94:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava campayam viharati gaggaraya pokkharaniya tire.
an10.94:1.2: Atha kho vajjiyamahito gahapati diva divassa campaya nikkhami bhagavantam dassanaya.
an10.94:1.8: Yannunaham yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam aramo tenupasankameyyan”ti.
an10.94:2.1: Atha kho vajjiyamahito gahapati yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam aramo tenupasankami.
an10.94:2.2: Tena kho pana samayena te annatitthiya paribbajaka sangamma samagamma unnadino uccasaddamahasadda anekavihitam tiracchanakatham kathenta nisinna honti.
an10.94:3.1: Addasamsu kho te annatitthiya paribbajaka vajjiyamahitam gahapatim duratova agacchantam. Disvana annamannam santhapesum:
an10.94:3.3: Ayam vajjiyamahito gahapati agacchati samanassa gotamassa savako.
an10.94:3.4: Yavata kho pana samanassa gotamassa savaka gihi odatavasana campayam pativasanti, ayam tesam annataro vajjiyamahito gahapati.
an10.94:3.5: Appasaddakama kho pana te ayasmanto appasaddavinita appasaddassa vannavadino.
an10.94:3.6: Appeva nama appasaddam parisam viditva upasankamitabbam manneyya”ti.
an10.94:4.1: Atha kho te annatitthiya paribbajaka tunhi ahesum.
an10.94:4.2: Atha kho vajjiyamahito gahapati yena te annatitthiya paribbajaka tenupasankami; upasankamitva tehi annatitthiyehi paribbajakehi saddhim sammodi.
an10.94:4.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho vajjiyamahitam gahapatim te annatitthiya paribbajaka etadavocum:
an10.94:4.4: “saccam kira, gahapati, samano gotamo sabbam tapam garahati, sabbam tapassim lukhajivim ekamsena upakkosati upavadati”ti?
an10.94:4.5: “Na kho, bhante, bhagava sabbam tapam garahati napi sabbam tapassim lukhajivim ekamsena upakkosati upavadati.
an10.94:4.6: Garayham kho, bhante, bhagava garahati, pasamsitabbam pasamsati.
an10.94:4.7: Garayham kho pana, bhante, bhagava garahanto pasamsitabbam pasamsanto vibhajjavado bhagava.
an10.94:5.1: Evam vutte, annataro paribbajako vajjiyamahitam gahapatim etadavoca:
an10.94:5.2: “agamehi tvam, gahapati, yassa tvam samanassa gotamassa vannam bhasati, samano gotamo venayiko appannattiko”ti?
an10.94:5.6: Iti kusalakusalam bhagava pannapayamano sapannattiko bhagava;
an10.94:6.1: Evam vutte te paribbajaka tunhibhuta mankubhuta pattakkhandha adhomukha pajjhayanta appatibhana nisidimsu.
an10.94:6.2: Atha kho vajjiyamahito gahapati te paribbajake tunhibhute mankubhute pattakkhandhe adhomukhe pajjhayante appatibhane viditva utthayasana yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
an10.94:6.3: Ekamantam nisinno kho vajjiyamahito gahapati yavatako ahosi tehi annatitthiyehi paribbajakehi saddhim kathasallapo tam sabbam bhagavato arocesi.
an10.94:7.2: Evam kho te, gahapati, moghapurisa kalena kalam sahadhammena suniggahitam niggahetabba.
an10.94:7.3: Naham, gahapati, sabbam tapam tapitabbanti vadami;
an10.94:7.4: na ca panaham, gahapati, sabbam tapam na tapitabbanti vadami;
an10.94:7.5: naham, gahapati, sabbam samadanam samaditabbanti vadami;
an10.94:7.6: na panaham, gahapati, sabbam samadanam na samaditabbanti vadami;
an10.94:7.7: naham, gahapati, sabbam padhanam padahitabbanti vadami;
an10.94:7.8: na panaham, gahapati, sabbam padhanam na padahitabbanti vadami;
an10.94:7.9: naham, gahapati, sabbo patinissaggo patinissajjitabboti vadami.
an10.94:7.10: Na panaham, gahapati, sabbo patinissaggo na patinissajjitabboti vadami;
an10.94:7.11: naham, gahapati, sabba vimutti vimuccitabbati vadami;
an10.94:7.12: na panaham, gahapati, sabba vimutti na vimuccitabbati vadami.
an10.94:8.1: Yanhi, gahapati, tapam tapato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti, evarupam tapam na tapitabbanti vadami.
an10.94:8.2: Yanca khvassa, gahapati, tapam tapato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, evarupam tapam tapitabbanti vadami.
an10.94:9.1: Yanhi, gahapati, samadanam samadiyato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti, evarupam samadanam na samaditabbanti vadami.
an10.94:9.2: Yanca khvassa, gahapati, samadanam samadiyato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, evarupam samadanam samaditabbanti vadami.
an10.94:10.1: Yanhi, gahapati, padhanam padahato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti, evarupam padhanam na padahitabbanti vadami.
an10.94:10.2: Yanca khvassa, gahapati, padhanam padahato akusala dhamma parihayanti kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, evarupam padhanam padahitabbanti vadami.
an10.94:11.1: Yanhi, gahapati, patinissaggam patinissajjato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti, evarupo patinissaggo na patinissajjitabboti vadami.
an10.94:11.2: Yanca khvassa, gahapati, patinissaggam patinissajjato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, evarupo patinissaggo patinissajjitabboti vadami.
an10.94:12.1: Yanhi, gahapati, vimuttim vimuccato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti, evarupa vimutti na vimuccitabbati vadami.
an10.94:12.2: Yanca khvassa, gahapati, vimuttim vimuccato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, evarupa vimutti vimuccitabbati vadami”ti.
an10.94:13.1: Atha kho vajjiyamahito gahapati bhagavata dhammiya kathaya sandassito samadapito samuttejito sampahamsito utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
an10.94:14.1: Atha kho bhagava acirapakkante vajjiyamahite gahapatimhi bhikkhu amantesi:
an10.94:14.2: “yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu digharattam apparajakkho imasmim dhammavinaye, sopi evamevam annatitthiye paribbajake sahadhammena suniggahitam nigganheyya yatha tam vajjiyamahitena gahapatina niggahita”ti.
